t: Extended Producer Responsibility(EPR) Compliance | Amazon UK
s: EPR stands for Extended Producer Responsibility. It’s an environmental policy that makes the producer of a product responsible for its entire life cycle. The main goal of EPR is to mitigate the environmental impacts of a product — from product design all the way through to end-of-life ...
